Is there anything you're looking for, i.e. x words, inspired by this country's language, etc?
no not really... mabye Danish but that's it
I called mine KAEDS, for Kerbal Aeronautical Engineering Development Sector, but that's probably just because I really like acronyms.

Well, then, Kercial Democrats?

In all seriousness, though, Bengsten Celestial Exploration Co.?

I like the "Celestial Exploration Co." but don't about Bengsten in front

how about "Kercial Democrats Celestial Exploration Co." Xb

In my "serious" save, I use the name Longbeast Logistics Shipping Company.

Choose a purpose for your company, and go with that. Decide whether you want to focus on exploration, research, tourism, transport, communications, mining, glory for the homeland, blowing things up...

In my "serious" save, I use the name Longbeast Logistics Shipping Company.

Choose a purpose for your company, and go with that. Decide whether you want to focus on exploration, research, tourism, transport, communications, mining, glory for the homeland, blowing things up...

If you want to focus on all of the above, make your space program an empire instead. I named mine the "Kyoto Empire", after the city in Japan.

well what i would go for if you could do any of them would be: communications, mining and transport (and a little research but not much)

EDIT: Would "Shark's Mining and Transport" (SMT) sound good
